main_options.desc1: A set of options which will only effect you
main_options.desc3: Manage resources or server specific options
main_options.desc5: Options that are handy for a developer

admin_options.desc1: Go through walls as if you are a ghost ðŸ‘»
admin_options.desc3: Now you can't see me anymore
admin_options.desc5: See what the names are of players
admin_options.desc6: See the locations of all the players on the map
admin_options.desc7: Smash your vehicle without it being damaged or destroyed
admin_options.desc9: Gives you infinite ammo for the current gun you are holding
admin_options.desc10: Gives every weapon in that category

server_options.desc1: Changes the weather to whatever is currently highlighted
server_options.desc2: Changes the time to the specified hour
server_options.desc3: Get a full list of players on the given radio frequency
server_options.desc4: Open a stash with the specified name

dev_options.desc1: Copy your current vector 2 coordinates to your clipboard
dev_options.desc2: Copy your current vector 3 coordinates to your clipboard
dev_options.desc3: Copy your current vector 4 coordinates to your clipboard
dev_options.desc4: Copy your current heading coordinates to your clipboard
dev_options.desc6: Displays all kinds of information about the vehicle you are sitting in

player_options.desc1: The same options you would find under admin options, but these will affect the chosen player

general.descgoto: Go to the currently selected player
general.descsitinveh: Sit in vehicle the currently selected player

administration.desckick: Yeet this player from the server
administration.descban: Perm yeet this player from the server

success.new_report: A new report has been received

error.no_perms: You don't have permission to do this
error.no_report_reply: Reply failed to send due to no message
error.not_optin: You are not opted in for admin duty. (/optin to toggle)
